mapper.insert: insert into SFSJCSJJLB (GQPBH, JCSJ, KWMC, DSJ, ZSJ, NL) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{kwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zsj,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{nl,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select GQPBH, JCSJ, KWMC, DSJ, ZSJ, NL from SFSJCSJJLB
